import React, { useContext, useState } from 'react' import useForm from './useForm' import validate from './UpdateFormValidationRules' // import { UserContext } from '../index' function Profile() { const { values, errors, handleSubmit, handleChange} = useForm(update, validate); const [location, setLocation] = useState({ country: "", state: "" }); function update() { console.log(values); } const [allowEdit, setallowEdit] = useState(false); // const { email } = useContext(UserContext); return (
{errors.Name && ({errors.Name})}
{errors.Email && ({errors.Email})}
{errors.Username && ({errors.Username})}
{errors.Password && ({errors.Password})}
{errors.DOB && ({errors.DOB})}
{errors.Gender && ({errors.Gender})}
) } export default Profile;
